Without the ability to recall their past, people would not be able to recognize friends and family, leading to feelings of isolation and disorientation.

As people struggled to learn new skills and remember how to perform daily tasks, crime rates could increase as individuals might turn to illegal activities to make a living or to obtain food and shelter.
Governments and organizations would face significant challenges in maintaining order and stability, as people would not remember their roles or responsibilities.
The economy would be severely impacted as people would forget how to work, manage finances, and trade.
As people tried to remember how to use technology, there could be a surge in demand for devices and tools that help people remember and learn.
